Class PasswordChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • PasswordChecker
  • public class PasswordChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    PasswordChecker class checks if password is correct

    • Method Detail

      • validatePassword

        public boolean validatePassword​(java.lang.String password,
                                int minimumLength)
        checks if password is correct according to all rules: password is not null password is not too short, has an uppercase letter and valid special symbol
        Parameters:
        password - - text of password that is checked
        minimumLength - - number of minimum symbols in password
        Returns:
        true if password is valid with all rules.4, false if not

      • checkPasswordNotNull

        public boolean checkPasswordNotNull​(java.lang.String password)
        checks if given password is not null
        Parameters:
        password - - text of password
        Returns:
        true if password is not null, false if password is null

      • passwordLengthCheck

        public boolean passwordLengthCheck​(java.lang.String password,
                                   int minimumLength)
        checks if password is at least minimum length or more
        Parameters:
        password - - text of password
        minimumLength - - number of minimum number of characters in password
        Returns:
        true if there is at least minimum number of characters or more, false otherwise

      • passwordCheckForUppercaseLetter

        public boolean passwordCheckForUppercaseLetter​(java.lang.String password)
        checks if password has at least one uppercase letter
        Parameters:
        password - - text of password
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one upper case letter A-Z

      • checkPasswordForSpecialSymbols

        public boolean checkPasswordForSpecialSymbols​(java.lang.String password)
        checks if password has at least one special symbols and if symbols are valid
        Parameters:
        password - - text of password
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one valid special symbols and no invalid symbols, otherwise false
